DataElement.preferredName: Patient Sustained Symptomatic Ventricular Arrhythmia Uncontrolled Pharmacotherapy Medical Device Eligibility Determination Yes No Unknown Not Applicable Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: a yes/no/unknown/not applicable indicator related to eligibility of a patient who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, exhibiting the sustained or symptomatic disease, relating to any variation from the normal rate or rhythm in the heart, which is not controlled, regulated, or constrained through the use of drugs or treatment.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Sustained Symptomatic Ventricular Arrhythmia Uncontrolled Pharmacotherapy Medical Device Eligibility Determination
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Information related to Eligibility of a patient who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, exhibiting the sustained or symptomatic disease, relating to any variation from the normal rate or rhythm in the heart, which is not controlled, regulated, or constrained through the use of drugs or treatment

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Sustained Symptomatic Ventricular Arrhythmia Uncontrolled Pharmacotherapy Medical Device Eligibility Determination
Property.preferredDefinition: No value exists.:Having to do with symptoms, which are signs of a condition or disease.:Of or relating to a ventricle (of the heart or brain).:Any variation from the normal rate or rhythm (which may include the origin of the impulse and/or its subsequent propagation) in the heart.:Not controlled, regulated, or constrained.:Treatment of disease through the use of drugs.:Any physical object that is useful for prevention, diagnosis, monitoring, or treatment of disease or other conditions.:Criteria to determine eligibility of patients for medical care programs and services.

Concepts.definition: Exhibiting the symptoms of a particular disease.
Of or relating to a ventricle (of the heart or brain).
Any variation from the normal rate or rhythm (which may include the origin of the impulse and/or its subsequent propagation) in the heart.
Treatment of disease through the use of drugs.
Any physical object that is useful for prevention, diagnosis, monitoring, or treatment of disease or other conditions.
The act of determining if a subject is suitable for enrollment in a study according specific protocol criteria and procedures.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

DataElementConcept.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Released as part of the Released CDE with Draft New DEC clean-up_10.04.17_ghd

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, unknown, or not applicable.

Concepts.longName: Yes, No, Unknown, or Not Applicable Response
Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, unknown, or not applicable.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Does patient have pacemaker,
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have pacemaker, defibrillator, or documented significant arrhythmia?
